greetingText: I really like your name btw!üíï
wishText: May Allah bless you with endless happiness and bless you healthy life. Success follows you everywhere by the grace of Allah. Thank you for making my life better. I'm grateful to Allah that Allah has sent you in my life. I'm lucky to have a friend who always sees the best in me and encourages me when I need it most. Please never leave me and stay with me forever ^_^
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
